page.title: 06LIFE STYLES
page.content: Basically the people of Alness follow the same trends, wearing the same style of clothes, and listening to the same sort of pop music, as elsewhere in the country.The town also has it's share of punks, mods and skinheads. There are few entertainment facilities other than sports, in Alness. Occasionally there is a disco held in the Averon Centre, or people can go to the Youth Club. For the over eighteens there are four licensed hotels and one public house to choose from. There are discos for over eighteens and bingo nights held in one of the hotels,weekly. There are five places to have a sit- down meal; any of the hotels mentioned or the Indian restaurant. You could have a meal from one of the five carry out restaurants. There is also a cafe open during shop hours.
